name: atk-ved-theme
description: АТК ВЭД — современная тема WordPress для логистической компании
author: ATK VED Team

scripts.minify:css: for file in css/*.css; do [ -f "$file" ] && npx cssnano "$file" "${file%.css}.min.css"; done
scripts.minify:js: for file in js/*.js; do [ -f "$file" ] && npx terser "$file" -o "${file%.js}.min.js" -c -m; done
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
